plot: 20 year old Saul, desperate to save money for a trip with friends to a horror convention agrees to do odd jobs around the house of Mary White. But Mary can see something in Saul that no one else can and tonight one of them is going to die.
title: Saul's Story
plot_es: 20 year old Saul, desperate to save money for a trip with friends to a horror convention agrees to do odd jobs around the house of Mary White. But Mary can see something in Saul that no one else can and tonight one of them is going to die.
plot_en: 20 year old Saul, desperate to save money for a trip with friends to a horror convention agrees to do odd jobs around the house of Mary White. But Mary can see something in Saul that no one else can and tonight one of them is going to die.
